slide1.title: About Fragrant Epiphany
slide1.p3: You might be here because of Tarot, or perhaps perfume, or maybe just because life lately has made you want a small change, but you don't know where to start.
slide1.p4: A deck of cards, a scent. Start here, and catch the scent of the self you haven't quite met yet.
slide1.quote:
"What is happening to me right now?"
"What can I become next?"

slide2.title: About Fragrant Epiphany
slide2.p1: What I want to do is:
slide2.list1: â€¢ First, use Tarot to illuminate that state in your subconscious
slide2.list2: â€¢ Then, from the world of scent, pick a few perfumes to accompany you
slide2.list3: â€¢ So what you get isn't just words, but an answer you can wear
slide2.p2: If you are ready, let Fragrant Epiphany accompany you starting from a deck of cards and a scent, slowly approaching the self that even you will fall in love with. ðŸŒ™âœ¨

q1.text: What is your current state of mind?

q2.text: What are you seeking most right now?

q6.text: Trust your intuition, pick a number.

result.title: The Revelation

past.label: Past
past.description: You have been carrying a heavy burden, but it has made you stronger. Your journey has led you here. Embrace the wisdom of the cards as they reveal the path ahead. Trust in their guidance, for they speak the language of your soul's deepest knowing.

present.label: Present
present.description: A moment of clarity is approaching. The present moment holds infinite possibilities. Open your heart to receive the blessings around you now.

future.label: Future
future.description: New opportunities will bloom if you are willing to let go of the old. Trust your intuition and take the next step with confidence. Your destiny awaits.

locked.title: THE REVELATION
locked.summary: A deep story from pause to rebirth.
locked.desc: You may have enjoyed a phase of fulfillment (9 of Cups) but also needed solitude to reset (4 of Swords). Now a clear new opportunity is calling (Ace of Wands) â€” rest time is over; step forward.

unlocked.title: Your Fragrance Journey

chapter1.title: Chapter 1 Â· Perfume
chapter1.name: TAM DAO
chapter1.quote: "In the quiet temple, find the inner light"

notes.base: Base - Ace of Wands: Amber, Musk, Rosewood

tarotInsight.title: "Tarot Insight"
tarotInsight.content:
The silence of '4 of Swords' returns to woody coolness.
The abundance of '9 of Cups' hides in sandalwood milkiness.
The call of 'Ace of Wands' melts into skin warmth.
â€”â€” A spiritual journey from seclusion to engagement.

chapter1.atmosphere:
It is not the burning incense, that smoky piety; nor is it new woodenware, with the sharpness of the craftsman. It is more like an ancient temple touched by sunlight and breeze for hundreds of years.
Stepping into the temple: The top note is dry cypress and cedar with a hint of green. Not the vibrant trees in the forest, but wood that has been felled, planed, and weathered, losing its fire. It carries a hint of ascetic coldness, as if you push open a heavy wooden door, the interior is dim, dust dancing in the light columns, the air filled with a secluded tranquility. This is the embodiment of '4 of Swords' â€”â€” a chosen solitude with restorative meaning.

chapter2.title: Chapter 2 Â· Home Fragrance
chapter2.name: FIGUIER

tarotInsight.title: "Healing of Space"
tarotInsight.content:
Make home your sanctuary.
The green and milky scent of fig,
Balances the noise outside and the desire inside.

chapter2.atmosphere: Close your eyes, as if you are in a Mediterranean summer afternoon. Sunlight spills through the broad fig leaves, casting dappled shadows. The air is filled with the fresh scent of sun-warmed leaves and the sweet milky aroma of ripe fruit. This is not just a fragrance, but a switch to instantly relax the soul, taking you back to that carefree afternoon.

chapter3.title: Chapter 3 Â· Signature
chapter3.content:
You suit a woody scent with a warm milky feel.
It has the 'keep away' coolness (4 of Swords),
The 'comfortable to be with' warmth (9 of Cups),
And finally leaves a lingering aftertaste (Ace of Wands).

Suggested:
1. Diptyque Tam Dao
2. Le Labo Santal 33
3. Aesop Hwyl

unlocked.footer: Congratulations on completing a journey of self-dialogue and subconscious discovery. We look forward to your next exploration.

journey.hubDesc: Choose a chapter to continue your scent story.

detail.subtitle: In quiet temples, find inner light

complete.desc: Thank you for journeying inward and uncovering your subconscious. We look forward to your next exploration.

perfume.title: Chapter 1 Â· Perfume
perfume.subtitle: Timber, sunbeam, and calm
story: A temple hallway, wood worn smooth by centuries of light. The silence of the Four of Swords cools the air; the abundance of the Nine of Cups softens into sandalwood milk; the Ace of Wands calls like a warm spark against skin.

This perfume is not smoke or raw timber. It is the patient, sacred air between pillars. Let go, and the door opens quietly. The scent rests close to the body, elegant and composed, carrying a hint of private radiance.

home.title: Chapter 2 Â· Home Fragrance
home.subtitle: Fig leaves, soft sun, quiet room
story: Under a fig tree at noon, light flickers through wide leaves. Green milkiness floats in the room; the air is slow and generous. It is a sanctuary tuned to your breath.
Strike a match, exhale gently. The room answers with shade and sweet warmth, wrapping the day in a calm, sun-warmed hush.

signature.title: Chapter 3 Â· Signature
signature.subtitle: A scent you can wear
story: Your signature lies between distance and closeness: a cool first impression, then a soft, lingering warmth. It echoes the journey from retreat to invitation.
Spray once on the pulse; let the note settle. It becomes an intimate glowâ€”quiet, confident, unmistakably yours.

about.intro1: Fragrant Epiphany is not just a tarot reading; it is a journey into the soul. We combine ancient wisdom with modern aesthetics to provide you with clarity, guidance, and a touch of magic in your daily life.
about.intro2: Our readings are designed to be intuitive, empowering, and deeply personal. Whether you seek answers about love, career, or self-discovery, our cards hold the mirror to your inner truth.
